document.full_text: the late pope john paul ii was moved a major step closer to sainthood on sunday at a ceremony that drew about a million and a half people to rome and was celebrated by catholics around the world.
document.title: pope john paul ii beatified before massive crowd
lines_and_colors: the late pope john paul ii was moved a major step closer to sainthood on sunday at a ceremony that drew about a million and a half people to rome and was celebrated by catholics around the world.
